tag.text: Walkthrough is out now! See how it works

home.subHeader: Bam Elephant is a quality "Made In Germany" drinking game, suited for all ages. Recommended ages are 6-99.
home.quote: Bam Elephant! This is not how the fish eats it's food.

description.suffix: That should help with any questions or confusion.

2.title: Can I play this with my friends?
2.description: Yes, this is a multiplayer experience, though locally. Get your friends round. Join the fun. 1 Person acts as the 'Game Master' and leads the game.

description.1: The 'Game Modes' are envisioned as a different start into game, for the different types of people or scenarios which you might find yourself in. If you play in a smaller group, you might aim for more of a low-key time. If you're out with the squad, maybe you want to try something more on the 'crazy' side. Check thet

description.2: are just a different starting points, regarding the pre-determined rules, applied to cards. Think of it like this. Haven't you ever played a card game with someone else, that tried to explain to you, that you've been playing a game wrong whole your life? People play the same games with different rules sometimes. We embrace this! Make it your own.

description.3: button in the top right corner

guide.quote: Why did we call this Bam Elephant again?

outdoors.title: Outdoors
outdoors.about: Share relevant, engaging, and inspirational brand messages to create a connection with your audience.
outdoors.description: Jack: assign new rule. Queen: assign new rule. KING assing new rule

low-key.title: Low-Key
low-key.about: A low-key scenario, just sit down with your friends. Put on some good music. Have a good time.
low-key.description: Seven: shuffle deck. Ace: assign new rule. Winner Determined: Highest Card Value.
